dcterms:description: A subset of hotel reviews crawled from TripAdvisor, consisting of reviews with sentences ranging from 50 to 250 words. The dataset includes roughly 340,000 training reviews and 40,000 testing reviews.
dcterms:title: Hotel Reviews

dcterms:description: A dataset extracted from the Wikipedia corpus, consisting of paragraphs that meet specific length requirements. The dataset includes roughly 500,000 training paragraphs and 50,000 testing paragraphs.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia
